erm.title: Emergency Recovery Mode
erm.description: Stabilize and exit recovery mode before subsystem-specific repair.

steps.instruction: Verify recovery mode condition is present.
steps.hint: Use this as your branch gate before deeper repairs.

steps.instruction: Perform recovery actions and clear recovery mode.
steps.hint: Do not proceed while recovery mode remains active.

power_distribution_reset.title: Power Distribution Reset
power_distribution_reset.description: Recover power routing and validate downstream systems.

steps.instruction: Confirm power distribution fault is active.
steps.hint: If not active, this procedure may be unnecessary.

steps.instruction: Reset power distribution path and verify fault clears.
steps.hint: Validate stable power before moving on.

nav_restart.title: NAV System Restart
nav_restart.description: Restart navigation and ensure NAV fault clears.

steps.instruction: Confirm NAV system error is active.
steps.hint: Only run NAV restart when NAV error is set.

steps.instruction: Execute NAV restart and verify error clears.
Replace or reset fuse and verify error clears.
steps.hint: Verify no immediate re-trip after restoration.

comms_recover.title: Comms Recover
comms_recover.description: Recover communications channel and validate signal path.

steps.hint: Check interface and antenna links before reset.

steps.instruction: Recover comms and verify fault clears.

dust_sensor_clean.title: Dust Sensor Clean
dust_sensor_clean.description: Clear dust sensor issues and verify normal operation.

steps.instruction: Confirm dust sensor error is active.
steps.hint: Inspect contamination around the sensor head.

steps.instruction: Clean sensor and verify error clears.
steps.hint: If recurring, escalate to hardware replacement.

electronic_heater_recover.title: Electronic Heater Recover
electronic_heater_recover.description: Recover heater subsystem and verify nominal state.

steps.instruction: Confirm electronic heater error is active.
steps.hint: Heater faults can propagate to power draw anomalies.

steps.instruction: Execute heater recovery and verify error clears.
